oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wedding photograph of Mr. and Mrs. James Collins Thurman, Jr., 1933 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A wedding photograph of Miss Kathryn Parrish, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William McMurray Parrish, to James Collins Thurman (Mr. and Mrs. James Collins Thurman, Jr.). Their wedding was announced in the Nashville Banner and “took place Tuesday morning, June 6 [1933] at 11 o’clock at the Episcopal Church of the Advent. Mr. and Mrs. Thurman will make their home in Chattanooga.” Forms part of the James C. Thurman Collection. 1 photograph ; b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parrish, Kathryn; Thurman family; Thurman, James C.
